_meanings:
{@--1@} ({%a%}) To tell, say,
inform, communicate, narrate
(usually with <ab>dat.</ab> of person); {#te#} 
{#rAmAya vaDopAyamAcaKyurvibuDadvizaH#} <ls>R. 15. 5</ls>,
<ls n="R. 15.">41</ls>, <ls n="R. 15.">71</ls>, <ls n="R. 15.">93</ls>; <ls n="R.">12. 42</ls>, <ls n="R. 12.">91</ls>; <ls>Bg. 11. 31</ls>,
<ls n="Bg.">18. 63</ls>; <ls>Me. 100</ls>; <ls>Ms. 8. 224</ls>, <ls n="Ms.">9. 73</ls>,
<ls>Y. 1. 66</ls>, <ls n="Y.">2. 65</ls>; sometimes with <ab>gen.</ab>
of person; {#AKyAhi Badre priyadarSanasya#}  
<ls>Pt. 4. 15</ls>; {#kenAhaM tavAKyAtaH#} <ls>Mb.</ls> ({%b%}) To
declare, announce, signify; <ls>R. 2. 11.</ls>

{@--3@} To look at, count; to
recite (<ab>Ved.</ab>).

{@--1@}
To cause to tell or narrate.
